name: Dualis
description:
Ver - was an ordinary traveler, before dangerous alien, called T'erus, tried to escape spaceship and connected to Ver's body. They came to compromise: Ver helps T'erus to escape spaceship and T'erus won't eat him...

_________________

This demo was made as hometask in short deadline, so, yeah, it sucks...

_________________

WASD - move

LMB -  attack

H - restore alien health

I - inventory

E - interract

_____________________

Music does  NOT  belong to me!!!

Music:  Feder - Lordly (Remix with no lyrics)
